text.0: i crave help from the imperial lords from indravaruṇa may they.
text.1: both favour one of us like me.
text.2: guardians of men ye ever come with ready succour at the call.
text.3: of every singer such as i.
text.4: sate you according to your wish o indravaruṇa with wealth.
text.5: fain would we have you nearest us.
text.6: may we be sharers of the powers sharers of the benevolence.
text.7: of you who give strength bounteously.
text.8: indra and varuṇa among givers of thousands meet for praise.
text.9: are powers who merit highest laud.
text.10: through their protection may we gain great store of wealth and heap it up.
text.11: enough and still to spare be ours.
text.12: o indravaruṇa on you for wealth in many a form i call.
text.14: o indravaruṇa through our songs that seek to win you to ourselves.
text.15: give us at once your sheltering help.
text.16: o indravaruṇa to you may fair praise which i offer come.
